Authors:
Jackeline Pereira Andrade, Cristiane Nascimento Figueiredo,
Rodrigo Pires Nascimento, Phellippe Arthur Santos Marbach, Jorge Teodoro
Souza
Title: Penicillium guaibinense sp. nov.
Abstract:
Penicillium guaibinense isolated from a Guaibim
Environmental Protection Area located in the states of Bahia, Brazil, is
described as a new species on the basis of molecular and morphological
analyses.
